articles.title: Greetings to King of Morocco
articles.content:
Greetings to King of Morocco
 Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Sunday sent a message of greeting to Mohamed â…¥, king of Morocco, on its national day.
					 The message sincerely wished the king bigger success in his work for the country's development and prosperity, expressing the belief that the relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would develop on good terms.

articles.title: DPRK Warns U.S. to Wake up from Foolish Dream of Doing Any Harm to DPRK: FM Spokesman
articles.content:
DPRK Warns U.S. to Wake up from Foolish Dream of Doing Any Harm to DPRK: FM Spokesman
 Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- A spokesman of the DPRK Foreign Ministry made public a statement on Sunday. It said:
					 The resounding success in the second test-fire of ICBM Hwasong-14 conducted on July 28 is a great victory of the DPRK that demonstrated once again the independent prestige and dignity of Juche nuclear power, the world-level rocket power.
					
					 The test-fire confirmed the DPRK's capability of making surprise launch of ICBM in any place and location any time, and clearly proved that the entire U.S. mainland is in the firing range of the DPRK's missiles.
					
					 The maximum range simulation test-fire of ICBM conducted by the DPRK this time is meant to send a stern warning to the U.S. making senseless remarks, being lost to reason in the frantic sanctions and pressure campaign against the DPRK.
					
					 The policy-makers of the U.S. who must have closely observed the successful second ICBM test-fire would now properly understand that the U.S., an aggression-minded state, would not go scot-free if it ever dared provoke the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. trumpeting about war and threat to impose extreme sanctions on the DPRK only emboldens the latter and provides further justification for its access to nukes.
					
					 To the Korean people who experienced disastrous disturbances of war on this land by the U.S. imperialist brutes, the powerful war deterrence for defending the state is an inevitable strategic option and it is a precious strategic asset that cannot be discarded or bartered for anything.
					
					 If the Yankees, who have imposed pain and misfortune upon the Korean people for over half a century through their bloody war of aggression and heinous hostile policy against the DPRK, dares brandish the nuclear stick on this land again despite the DPRK's repeated warnings, the DPRK will clearly teach them manners with the nuclear strategic force which it had so far shown the U.S. one after another.
					
					 The U.S. should clearly understand the strategic position of the DPRK which has become a world nuclear power and a rocket power and the resolve of its army and people for retaliation, and wake up from the foolish dream of doing any harm to the DPRK.
					
					 In case the U.S. fails to come to its own senses and continues to resort to military adventure and "tough sanctions", the DPRK will respond with its resolute act of justice as already declared.

articles.title: DPRK Players Back Home
articles.content:
DPRK Players Back Home
 Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- The DPRK players returned home on Sunday after proving successful at the 2017 Asian Junior and Juvenile Weightlifting Championships.
					 They bagged 10 gold medals and 2 silver medals at the championships.

articles.title: Syrian Delegation Pays Homage to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Syrian Delegation Pays Homage to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Syria Baath Children Organization led by Waddah Sawas, director of the Technology, Information and External Relations Department, visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun on Sunday.
					 Members of the delegation paid homage to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il before their statues at the palace.
					
					 They paid high tribute to the great leaders in the halls where they lie in state.
					
					 Then they went round the halls where the orders the great leaders received are on display and the halls which house the cars, electric car, boat and train coaches used by them for their field guidance and foreign tours till the last moments of their lives. 
					
					 The head of the delegation made an entry in the visitor's book.

articles.title: Dancing Parties Held to Celebrate Second Test-fire of Hwasong-14
articles.content:
Dancing Parties Held to Celebrate Second Test-fire of Hwasong-14
 Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- Dancing parties of working people and youth and students took place on Sunday to celebrate the successful second test-fire of intercontinental ballistic rocket Hwasong-14.
					 Kim Il Sung Square and other parts of the capital city were crowded with working people and youth and students to celebrate another great event, special and auspicious jubilee which rocked the world.
					
					 Dancing parties began amid the playing of song "Our Leader Loved by People".
					
					 The participants danced in boundless reverence for respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un, who is firmly defending the sovereignty and dignity of the country with the powerful strategic nuclear force of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 The mood of the dancing parties revved up with the playing of "The Country of the People", "The General Star beyond the Clouds" and other songs.

articles.title: Successful Second ICBM Test-fire Hailed
articles.content:
Successful Second ICBM Test-fire Hailed
 Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- The DPRK people express their pleasure over the news of the successful second test-fire of intercontinental ballistic rocket Hwasong-14.
					 Kim Chang Won, manager of the Pyongyang Automation Appliances Factory, told KCNA:
					
					 Seeing the launch of our ICBM, I felt my heart full of great emotion.
					
					 The successful ICBM test-fire is a demonstration of the strategic position of the DPRK which emerged as the Juche nuclear power and world-level rocket power, and another great victory the DPRK people won in the century-long confrontation with the U.S.
					
					 Ri Sung Chol, vice-director of the Pyongyang City Air Club, said:
					
					 The successful test-fire means another heavy blow upon the U.S, chieftain of evil.
					
					 I express my heartfelt thanks to respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un for wining the great victory by dealing the blow upon the U.S.
					
					 So Ki Chol, vice-chairman of the Rangnang District People's Committee in Pyongyang City, said:
					
					 Another success in ICBM test-fire is a greatest victory and event to be specially recorded in national history.
					
					 I feel the pride of being a citizen of the country possessed of powerful ICBM which can strike the whole U.S. mainland anytime from anywhere.
					
					 I will do my best as an official in charge of improving the people's living with the spirit displayed by scientists and technicians in the field of defence industry in demonstrating the powerful might of our strategic nuclear force.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Deals with WPK's Steadfast Will to Put Definite End to Struggle against U.S. Imperialists
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Deals with WPK's Steadfast Will to Put Definite End to Struggle against U.S. Imperialists 
 Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- The DPRK's spectacular success in the second test-fire of ICBM Hwasong-14 capable of striking the whole U.S. mainland is the great victory of the traditional fighting method of the Workers' Party of Korea which has recorded shining victories only in the showdown with the U.S..
					 Rodong Sinmun Sunday says in an article:
					
					 The WPK's history is the proud course in which it has led the confrontation with the U.S. to victory through successive offensive by matchless courage and pluck.
					
					 It is the steadfast will of the WPK to put a definite end to the struggle against the U.S. imperialists which has lasted generation after generation through successive offensive.
					
					 The WPK set forth the new line of simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force in order to defend the sovereignty of the country from the unprecedented nuclear threat and blackmail of the U.S. imperialists and successfully carried out the line without an inch of deflection and a single step of concession.
					
					 Steadfast is the will of the army and people of the DPRK to steadily bolster up the war deterrent both in quality and quantity, not giving the enemies a chance to come to their senses, and thus make the U.S. write the last page of its final doom in its mainland in face of the might of the Paektusan army under the uplifted banner of the new line of developing the two fronts, no matter how loudly they may talk about maximum pressure and engagement.
					
					 The WPK has put forward self-reliance and self-development based on science and technology as the driving force of socialism and rapidly developed the country's science and technology at the speed the enemies can hardly guess by relying on the large contingent of scientists and technicians boundlessly loyal to the party and the revolution.
					
					 The DPRK's reality goes to clearly prove that only when it holds hegemony in the field of science and technology, can it overtake imperialism in the race of national power and even a small country and nation exalt its dignity as a strong country and a great nation.

articles.title: U.S. Sanctions against DPRK Totally Gone Bust: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
U.S. Sanctions against DPRK Totally Gone Bust: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- The DPRK decided to develop ICBM by itself and managed to attain its goal in the face of the U.S. threat of invasion and ceaseless and vicious economic sanctions against the former, Rodong Sinmun Sunday says in a commentary. It goes on:
					 The U.S. left no stone unturned to stifle the DPRK by force. It resorted to all nasty moves to bar the latter from gaining access to rocket technologies, equipment, etc. because the latter tried to have powerful war deterrent to cope with the U.S. moves. The U.S. didn't hesitate to mobilize the UN to pressurize the DPRK.
					
					 What matters is the U.S. has not yet pulled itself together, clamoring that the DPRK's move poses "a threat to the globe" and "the international community should join hands in imposing sanctions upon the DPRK".
					
					 Now that the DPRK has access to ICBM, not to mention nukes, the U.S. is trying to put the blame on others, talking rubbish. It also claimed that it would intensify its independent sanctions while trying to apply tougher sanctions by using the UNSC.
					
					 The U.S. sanctions are a total flop.
					
					 The desperate moves of the U.S. imperialists will only redouble the will of the Korean army and people to dynamically accelerate the bolstering of defense capabilities and the building of an economic power while holding fast to the line of simultaneously developing the two fronts.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korean Authorities' Burlesque
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korean Authorities' Burlesque
 Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Sunday in a commentary ridicules the south Korean authorities who were going busy with various kinds of "commemorations" with July 27 as an occasion.
					 This is a disgusting burlesque aimed to cover up their treacherous colors as provocateurs of a war of aggression against the DPRK in collusion with the U.S. imperialists in the 1950s and shameful setbacks they suffered in battles and justify the policy of confrontation with the compatriots in the north, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 The U.S. imperialists claimed that they sustained no defeat in over 100-year history of war of aggression. But they gained in the Korean war huge casualties and dishonor of bitter setbacks. It is ridiculous for the south Korean authorities to seek to hide the stark realities through such charades as "commemorations" and "expression of thanks" and justify their criminal war of aggression.
					
					 They praised the man-killers who massacred our brothers and sisters as "benefactors" and disgustingly behaved before them, talking about "thanks" and "etiquette." This could not but be funny acts perpetrated by the pro-U.S. traitors. 
					
					 When looking back on history, it has been the disgraceful tradition of the U.S. imperialists and their lackeys that they suffered defeats, hit hard by the DPRK, and it has been the proud history of the DPRK that it dealt hard blows at the U.S. which counted on its tremendous muscle and the puppet warmongers, its lackeys.
					
					 If the U.S. and the puppet warmongers ignite a war of aggression again, oblivious of historic lesson, the army and people of the DPRK will wipe out the enemies to the last one so that there would be no one left to sign a document of surrender.

articles.title: S. Korean Organization Proclaims Period of Struggle against U.S. and War
articles.content:
S. Korean Organization Proclaims Period of Struggle against U.S. and War
 Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Democracy, People's Life, Peaceful Reunification and Sovereignty in south Korea held a press conference in the vicinity of the U.S. embassy in Seoul on July 27, according to the south Korean internet paper Jaju Sibo.
					 The organization proclaimed the days from July 27 to August 26 as the period of the struggle against the U.S. and war and expressed its stand to struggle to urge the U.S. administration to stop war drills, drop the THAAD deployment and repeal the wrong "policy toward the north".

articles.title: Abrogation of SL and Release of Prisoners of Conscience Called for
articles.content:
Abrogation of SL and Release of Prisoners of Conscience Called for
 Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- The Family Movement for Realizing Democracy in south Korea held the 1 132th Thursday meeting in Seoul on July 27 calling for abrogation of the "Security Law" and release of the prisoners of conscience, according to the south Korean online paper Saram Ilbo.
					 They urged the regime to set right the master-servant south Korea-U.S. relations, withdraw the SL and set free all prisoners of conscience.

articles.title: Chairman of Chongryon Central Standing Committee Meets IIJI Director-General
articles.content:
Chairman of Chongryon Central Standing Committee Meets IIJI Director-General
 Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- Ho Jong Man, chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), met and had a talk with Ramon Jimenez Lopez, director-general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea (IIJI), and his wife and Secretary General Kenichi Ogami when they visited the Korean Hall in Tokyo on July 19.

articles.title: Document Disclosing Corruption and Irregularities of Traitor Lee Myung Bak Opened to Public
articles.content:
Document Disclosing Corruption and Irregularities of Traitor Lee Myung Bak Opened to Public
 Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- Brought into new disclosure was a document proving the crimes of traitor Lee Myung Bak, kingpin of corruption and irregularities, according to the south Korean CBS. 
					 A person concerned of Chongwadae said that the document discloses the contents related to the crime of Jong Ok Gun, former chief of puppet naval staff who helped the Lotte Business, a company granted special benefits by the traitor, make money in the course of introducing high-speed ships and took a bribe amounting to hundreds of millions of won.

articles.title: War Victory Day of Korean People Observed Abroad
articles.content:
War Victory Day of Korean People Observed Abroad
Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- Meetings, lectures, photo exhibitions and film shows were held in Bangladesh, Russia, Peru, Nigeria and Algeria from July 20 to 24 to mark the 64th anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 "The Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum" and other Korean films were shown.
					
					 The chairman of the Bangladesh-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Committee and the chairperson of the Bangladesh Group for the Study of the Songun Policy said that July 27 is the war victory day of the DPRK and the day specially recorded in the history of world wars because the day clearly showed the world that the U.S. is never "the world's strongest" and one is sure to win when one fights against the U.S.
					
					 The chairman of the Khabarovsk Territory Branch of the Youth Guards, an all-Russia social body affiliated to the United Russia Party, said that the U.S. can never evade the responsibility for having ignited the Korean War.
					
					 The secretary general of the Peruvian-Korean Institute of Culture and Friendship noted that President Kim Il Sung was an outstanding thinker and theoretician and a peerlessly great man recognized by the world as he fathered the Juche idea, defeated the U.S. and Japanese imperialists and built the socialist country in Korea. 
					
					 He said that the DPRK could become a military power possessed of H-bomb and ICBM thanks to the wise leadership of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il who were gifted with far-sighted wisdom and respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un who is honorably defending the country's dignity and sovereignty by leading the political and military showdown with the U.S. to victory.
					
					 The nuclear weapons of the DPRK are not ones for invading other countries but military deterrence for defending the sovereignty of the country and the peace in the region from the threat and blackmail of the U.S. that have lasted for over half a century, he added.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Praised by Media of Russia, Congo
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Praised by Media of Russia, Congo
 Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- Media of Russia and Congo carried photo-accompanying special write-ups on July 17 to mark the fifth anniversary of the conferment of the title of the DPRK Marshal on respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					 Russia's online magazine Lemchich in an article titled "Glory of Korea" said:
					
					 The conferment of the title of the DPRK Marshal on Comrade Kim Jong Un was the offspring of the Korean people's absolute trust in and pure loyalty to him and the noteworthy event which promised the prosperity of the great Paektusan nation and the final victory of the cause of building a socialist power.
					
					 Comrade Kim Jong Un is the peerlessly great man and the sun of the 21st century praised by the whole world.
					
					 Russian internet homepage Griffon-Personal posted an article titled "Man pursuing policy of love for people".
					
					 His policy of love for the people draws interest of the international community, the article said, introducing in detail about his noble outlook on the people and younger generation.
					
					 The Russian paper Zavtra carried photos showing the might of the defence industry of the DPRK for self-defence rapidly developing under his energetic leadership.
					
					 The Congolese paper Le Patriot dedicated one page to an article which said that Kim Jong Un put forward the line of simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force and put the DPRK on the position of a nuclear power in the East and rocket power in Asia.

articles.title: Ukrainian Body Supports DPRK's Steps for Self-defence
articles.content:
Ukrainian Body Supports DPRK's Steps for Self-defence
 Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- We fully support the DPRK's steps for self-defence to bolster up its defence capabilities.
					 The Association for the Study of the Juche Idea in Lvov, Ukraine said this in a statement on July 9.
					
					 The statement went on:
					
					 We extend sincere congratulations to respected Comrade Kim Jong Un and all the Korean people as regards the successful test-launch of ICBM Hwasong-14.
					
					 This noteworthy event opened up the new chapter in the history of the DPRK.
					
					 The perfect success of ICBM Hwasong-14 showed the imperialists that the DPRK is able to strike any strongholds of aggression as it wishes.
					
					 It is the full-fledged right of the DPRK to bolster up the nuclear deterrence for self-defence as it is defending and advancing socialism against the moves of the imperialists.
					
					 We hope that the Korean people will achieve new successes in the drive to build a socialist power.
